welcome_message_body: Welcome to Girona, the charming city known for its medieval architecture, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Girona has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Girona-Costa Brava Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
